page.title: Jimmy Buffett sound board live albums

rev.comment: rv fair use images via WP:NFCC; no fair use in discographies

Line 3: Line 3:
{{TOCleft}}
{{TOCleft}}
==Live in Auburn, WA==<!-- This section is linked from [[Live in Auburn, WA]] and [[Live in Auburn]] -->
==Live in Auburn, WA==<!-- This section is linked from [[Live in Auburn, WA]] and [[Live in Auburn]] -->
â
[[Image:Live in Auburn, WA.jpg|175px|right]]
 
'''''Live in Auburn, WA''''' or '''''Live in Auburn (Seattle), WA''''' was recorded at [[White River Amphitheatre]] in [[Auburn, Washington]] on [[16 September]] 2003. It was released in November 2003 on two [[compact disc]]s on [[Mailboat Records|Mailboat]] 2100.
'''''Live in Auburn, WA''''' or '''''Live in Auburn (Seattle), WA''''' was recorded at [[White River Amphitheatre]] in [[Auburn, Washington]] on [[16 September]] 2003. It was released in November 2003 on two [[compact disc]]s on [[Mailboat Records|Mailboat]] 2100.
Line 10: Line 9:
==Live in Las Vegas, NV==<!-- This section is linked from [[Live in Las Vegas, NV]] and [[Live in Las Vegas]] -->
==Live in Las Vegas, NV==<!-- This section is linked from [[Live in Las Vegas, NV]] and [[Live in Las Vegas]] -->
â
[[Image:Live in Las Vegas, NV.jpg|175px|right]]
 
'''''Live in Las Vegas, NV''''' was recorded at [[MGM Grand Garden Arena]] in [[Las Vegas, Nevada]] on [[20 September]] 2003. It was released in November 2003 on two [[compact disc]]s on [[Mailboat Records|Mailboat]] 2102 and reached #13 on the [[Billboard charts#Top Independent Albums|''Billboard'' Top Independent Albums]] chart.
'''''Live in Las Vegas, NV''''' was recorded at [[MGM Grand Garden Arena]] in [[Las Vegas, Nevada]] on [[20 September]] 2003. It was released in November 2003 on two [[compact disc]]s on [[Mailboat Records|Mailboat]] 2102 and reached #13 on the [[Billboard charts#Top Independent Albums|''Billboard'' Top Independent Albums]] chart.
Line 17: Line 15:
==Live in Cincinnati, OH==<!-- This section is linked from [[Live in Cincinnati, OH]] and [[Live in Cincinnati]] -->
==Live in Cincinnati, OH==<!-- This section is linked from [[Live in Cincinnati, OH]] and [[Live in Cincinnati]] -->
â
[[Image:Live in Cincinnati, OH.jpg|175px|right]]
 
'''''Live in Cincinnati, OH''''' was recorded at [[Riverbend Music Center]] in [[Cincinnati, Ohio]] on [[26 August]] 2003. It was released in January 2004 on two [[compact disc]]s on [[Mailboat Records|Mailboat]] 2106.
'''''Live in Cincinnati, OH''''' was recorded at [[Riverbend Music Center]] in [[Cincinnati, Ohio]] on [[26 August]] 2003. It was released in January 2004 on two [[compact disc]]s on [[Mailboat Records|Mailboat]] 2106.
Line 24: Line 21:
==Live in Mansfield, MA==<!-- This section is linked from [[Live in Mansfield, MA]] and [[Live in Mansfield]] -->
==Live in Mansfield, MA==<!-- This section is linked from [[Live in Mansfield, MA]] and [[Live in Mansfield]] -->
â
[[Image:Live in Mansfield, MA.jpg|175px|right]]
 
'''''Live in Mansfield, MA''''' or '''''Live in Mansfield (Boston), MA''''' was recorded at [[Tweeter Center for the Performing Arts]] in [[Mansfield, Massachusetts]] on [[30 August]] 2003. It was released in January 2004 on two [[compact disc]]s on [[Mailboat Records|Mailboat]] 2107.
'''''Live in Mansfield, MA''''' or '''''Live in Mansfield (Boston), MA''''' was recorded at [[Tweeter Center for the Performing Arts]] in [[Mansfield, Massachusetts]] on [[30 August]] 2003. It was released in January 2004 on two [[compact disc]]s on [[Mailboat Records|Mailboat]] 2107.
Line 31: Line 27:
==Live in Hawaii==<!-- This section is linked from [[Live in Hawaii]] -->
==Live in Hawaii==<!-- This section is linked from [[Live in Hawaii]] -->
â
[[Image:Live in Hawaii.jpg|175px|right]]
 
'''''Live in Hawaii''''' was recorded at the [[Waikiki Shell]] in [[Honolulu, Hawaii]] on [[28 January]] 2004 and the [[Maui Arts & Cultural Center]] in [[Kahului, Hawaii]] on [[30 January]] 2004. It was released in March 2005 on two [[compact disc]]s on [[Mailboat Records|Mailboat]] 2109. ''Live in Hawaii'' includes a bonus [[DVD]] containing 16 minutes of footage from the two shows. The show was introduced by [[Don Ho]] and featured performances by [[Martin Denny]] and [[Henry Kopono]].
'''''Live in Hawaii''''' was recorded at the [[Waikiki Shell]] in [[Honolulu, Hawaii]] on [[28 January]] 2004 and the [[Maui Arts & Cultural Center]] in [[Kahului, Hawaii]] on [[30 January]] 2004. It was released in March 2005 on two [[compact disc]]s on [[Mailboat Records|Mailboat]] 2109. ''Live in Hawaii'' includes a bonus [[DVD]] containing 16 minutes of footage from the two shows. The show was introduced by [[Don Ho]] and featured performances by [[Martin Denny]] and [[Henry Kopono]].
Line 39: Line 34:
== Live at Fenway Park==<!-- This section is linked from [[Live at Fenway Park]] -->
== Live at Fenway Park==<!-- This section is linked from [[Live at Fenway Park]] -->
{{for|the Dave Matthews Band album|Live Trax Vol. 6}}
{{for|the Dave Matthews Band album|Live Trax Vol. 6}}
â
[[Image:Live at Fenway Park.jpg|175px|right]]
 
'''''Live at Fenway Park''''' was recorded at [[Fenway Park]] [[stadium|ballpark]] in [[Boston, Massachusetts]] on [[10 September]] and [[12 September]] 2004. It was released in November 2005 on two [[compact disc]]s on [[Mailboat Records|Mailboat]] 2115. ''Live at Fenway Park'' includes a [[DVD]] containing 55 minutes of footage from the two shows.
'''''Live at Fenway Park''''' was recorded at [[Fenway Park]] [[stadium|ballpark]] in [[Boston, Massachusetts]] on [[10 September]] and [[12 September]] 2004. It was released in November 2005 on two [[compact disc]]s on [[Mailboat Records|Mailboat]] 2115. ''Live at Fenway Park'' includes a [[DVD]] containing 55 minutes of footage from the two shows.
Line 46: Line 40:
== Live in Anguilla==<!-- This section is linked from [[Live in Anguilla]] -->
== Live in Anguilla==<!-- This section is linked from [[Live in Anguilla]] -->
â
[[Image:Live in Anguilla.jpg|175px|right]]
 
'''''Live in Anguilla''''' was recorded at [[reggae]] singer [[Bankie Banx]]'s beach bar, the Dune Preserve, in Rendezvous Bay, [[Anguilla]], [[British West Indies]], and Banx appears on the cover of the album. It was released in November 2007 on two [[compact disc]]s on [[Mailboat Records|Mailboat]]. ''Live in Anguilla'' includes an 82-minute [[DVD]] of concert footage.
'''''Live in Anguilla''''' was recorded at [[reggae]] singer [[Bankie Banx]]'s beach bar, the Dune Preserve, in Rendezvous Bay, [[Anguilla]], [[British West Indies]], and Banx appears on the cover of the album. It was released in November 2007 on two [[compact disc]]s on [[Mailboat Records|Mailboat]]. ''Live in Anguilla'' includes an 82-minute [[DVD]] of concert footage.
